problem_names: lemma BigAndImp: "A \<Turnstile> (\<^bold>\<And>P \<^bold>\<rightarrow> G) \<longleftrightarrow> ((\<forall>F \<in> set P. A \<Turnstile> F) \<longrightarrow> A \<Turnstile> G)"
translations: lemma BigAndImp: "A \<Turnstile> (\<^bold>\<And>P \<^bold>\<rightarrow> G) \<longleftrightarrow> ((\<forall>F \<in> set P. A \<Turnstile> F) \<longrightarrow> A \<Turnstile> G)"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. A \<Turnstile> \<^bold>\<And>P \<^bold>\<rightarrow> G =
    ((\<forall>F\<in>set P. A \<Turnstile> F) \<longrightarrow>
     A \<Turnstile> G)
by(induction rule: ND.induct; simp add: entailment_def; blast)
(* yeah, Isabelle's facilities are very good with this kind of problem\<dots> maybe we should show one or the other case. *)
